How easy to scan is your sidebar menu? If you haven’t optimized the spacing, users will likely spend more time navigating and finding items.

Balancing the spacing in the sidebar can help users navigate faster and easier. A typical mistake designers make is adding too much or not enough space. Both can make scanning for a particular item slow and difficult.
